Ok, final thing having anything to do with coke or popcorn:

::Havoc::

With a loud burp from the junk food he had just consumed, Havoc 
settles down slightly to watch the Maximals talk to Megaton.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Demolition::
> 
> He takes the Coke, and has a drink. He then has some more pop corn.
> 
> OOC: Yeah, I think thats enough.
